response.overview: Fifteen-year-old Darius is stranded and alone in the Romanian countryside. Overweight, slow-witted, and desperate, he survives by stealing food and trinkets from strangers who barely notice him. As he wanders from village to village, Darius’s clumsy crimes draw both suspicion and pity, revealing a boy caught between innocence and survival.
response.tagline: He’s not clever. He’s not strong. But he’s still here.
response.title: Lost In Romania
